verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, let us sing,
Sing till the power of the Lord comes down.
Come, let us sing,
Sing till the power of the Lord comes down.
Lift up your hands; be not afraid.
Come, let us sing till the power of the Lord comes down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Christ Jesus lives. He is alive in His church today.
Christ Jesus lives. He is alive in His church today.
So let us rise and follow Him.
Christ Jesus lives. He is alive in His church today.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
/Vamos cantando hasta que baje el poder/(2)
Dad gloria a Dios, dad gloria a El
Vamos cantando hasta que baje el poder.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
/No te avergüences y alaba a tu Señor/(2)
Dad gloria a Dios , dad gloria a El
No te avergüences y alaba a tu Señor.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Alza tu voz y alaba a tu Señor…
